title: Runny110
author: Runny110
content: I gave access to my tokens to a certain address via 'permit' signed message, and now I want to remove this access.Actually there is a contract on polygon chain that wants to transfer my USDTs but it can't because fortunately I don't have enough gas in my wallet. How can I remove the access?

comments.author: Maus0728
comments.body: If you are using metamask, you can actually edit the "spending cap" using this guide: https://support.metamask.io/hc/en-us/articles/6055177143579There are other third party option as well such as these[1], but I highly suggest you to stick with Metamask first before using any other token approval application.[1] https://support.metamask.io/hc/en-us/articles/4446106184731-How-to-revoke-smart-contract-allowances-token-approvals
